COMMENT_TX: Debut game for Rafael Rodriguez
originally scored as single, changed to double after game.
$This is umpire Derryl Cousins' 4,000th major league game; he is the 18th person to umpire 4,000 games
Kelley left with strained oblique after 3 pitches
$Johnson's bunt rolled down the 1B line; Varitek threw to 1B to get Johnson but Balentien rounded second and started back to 1B thinking it was a foul ball.

$Napoli overslid base so did not reach and hold it safely. Originally scored as double, but changed to single on 6-10-2009

replay,1,huffa001,BAL,wintm901,SEA03,F,N,I,,H $Aubrey Huff hit a fly down the RF line near the pole that was ruled a home run; the umpires huddled and changed the call to a foul ball and Orioles manager Dave Trembley came out to discuss the ruling; acting crew chief Mike Winters decided to watch the replay and upheld the foul call after a two-minute review

$Mariners SS Yuniesky Betancourt and LF Endy Chavez collided as Betancourt made a spectacular catch of the popup; Chavez was taken off the field on a a motorized cart with possible ligament damage to his right knee

$the 5000th home run by the Mariners, appropriately hit by Ken Griffey

ej,hairs001,P,hudsm901,Balls and strikes ej,blacb001,M,hudsm901,Balls and strikes on Hairston $Scott Hairston started towards first after a 3-2 pitch that he thought was high and outside; HP umpire Marvin Hudson emphatically called him out on the pitch and Hairston yelled at Hudson, who ejected Hairston; Padres manager Bud Black was also ejected by Hudson

replay,6,custj001,OAK,wintm901,SEA03,F,N,I,,H $Jack Cust hit the first pitch down the RF line and the ball struck a window at the top of a restaurant; it was called foul by 1B umpire and acting crew chief Mike Winters; Athletics manager Bob Geren asked if it went over the pole; Winters watched the replay and upheld the call as a foul ball
